price: La, hasha! Kwa hakika huo ni Moto mkali kabisa,
footnotes: Ewe mkosefu! Wacha hayo unayo yatamani ya kutaka kujikomboa kwa fidia! Hakika huo moto, unawaka kweli!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
